entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
